meaningMnemonic: People who <kanji>join</kanji> in a <kanji>chant</kanji> <kanji>group</kanji> are people who are in a <vocabulary>chorus</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>choir</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 合 is pretty weird. It's a がっ instead of a ごう. Just imagine a bunch of people in a chorus singing "ga ga ga ga gaaaa!"
